metadata.title: CVE-2022-1184 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in fs/ext4/namei.c:dx_insert_block() in theLinux kernelâ€™s filesystem sub-component. This flaw allows a local attackerwith a user privilege to cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-242-generic - 4.4.0-242.276
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-242-generic - 4.4.0-242.276
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-242-lowlatency - 4.4.0-242.276
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-214.225~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-214.225~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1121-kvm - 4.4.0-1121.131
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1158-aws - 4.4.0-1158.173
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1159-aws - 4.15.0-1159.172~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1168-azure - 4.15.0-1168.183~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1153-gcp - 4.15.0-1153.170~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1122-oracle - 4.15.0-1122.133~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-242.276').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-214.225~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1121.131').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1158.173').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1159.172~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1168.183~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1090.97').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1153.170~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1122.133~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-snapdragon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
